name: Friday Night Funkin' BUT BAD | FNF Mod | HTML 5 Online Port
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' BUT BAD | FNF Mod | HTML 5 Online Port
description:
Ugly beauty.

Thanks to the custom Gamasexual Engine, the controls are fully configurable. Go to the Options menu to map each action to whatever key you want.

The downloadable version of the mod, on which this port is based, is available here. All the credit goes to CLF.
